name: Frostfire Bindings
tooltip:
Frostfire BindingsLevel 60

Archmage Angela Dosantos at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Frostfire Bindings if you bring her the following: 1 Desecrated Bindings, 6 Wartorn Cloth Scraps, 1 Arcane Crystal and 1 Nexus Crystal.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Bindings
- Wartorn Cloth Scrap x 6
- Arcane Crystal
- Nexus Crystal
